name: Falconet (itch)
description:
Falconet is a 16-bit retro style twin-stick-shooter with smooth weapon switching and quick reaction puzzlelike gameplay. As a highly advanced weapons entity, your mission as the Falconet is to take on an army of rogue machines and rescue humans trapped behind enemy lines. To accomplish your mission, you will need to rapidly switch between your diverse arsenal of weapons to quickly eliminate your enemies… before they eliminate you. 

Falconet is still in early stages of development, and we are looking for your feedback! Post a comment below or join us on Discord and let us know what you think.

https://discord.gg/tVm5T9Yrhw

Developed by Iruka Software:

Christopher Golden -  Game design and animation
Daniel Holmes - Software development
